Headline: #7 Harrison Temporary Reroute near Polk/Paulina
ShortDescription: 7 Harrison buses temp. rerouted EB: Wood, Taylor, Paulina and Harrison; WB: Harrison, Paulina, Taylor and Wood: due to, street blockage near Polk/Paulina.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#7 Harrison buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Polk/Paulina.

Eastbound buses will operate via Wood, Taylor, Paulina and Harrison including the normal route streets at the beginning and end.

Westbound buses will operate via Harrison, Paulina, Taylor, Wood and Harrison.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Jackson/Ashland
ShortDescription: Eastbound 126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Ashland, Congress, Loomis and Jackson due to street blockage near Jackson/Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Ashland, Congress, Loomis and Jackson due to street blockage near Jackson/Ashland.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near Harrison
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing near Harrison due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing near Harrison due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
